title: Transforming waste cellulosic fabric dyed with Reactive Yellow C4GL into value textile by a microwave assisted energy efficient system of color stripping
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Anam Akhtar, Mubashar Alam, Sadia Noureen, Shaukat Ali, Adina Tehreem Tahir, Aiman Shoukat
